name: imgViewer2
description: extensible, responsive jquery plugin to zoom and pan images using the Leaflet mapping library

scripts.minify:js: echo '=> minify:js' && uglifyjs src/*.js -o dist/imgViewer2.min.js && cp dist/imgViewer2.min.js examples/lib
scripts.build: echo '=> building'  && npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Wayne Mogg
